name: Rezilient Health
description: Rezilient Health bridges the convenience of telehealth with the broad scope of in-person care by offering neighborhood CloudClinics where families can get virtual access to their doctor as well as physical exams, labs, and imaging.
one_liner: Rezilient Health bridges the convenience of telehealth with the broad scope of in-person care by offering neighborhood CloudClinics where families can get virtual access to their doctor as well as physical exams, labs, and imaging.
